function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Immigrant women working in hard-hit service sectors","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols and provide adequate protective equipment","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices","People":"Immigrant women","Owner":"Employers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Disproportionate burden on mothers with small children","Impact":"Increased stress and risk of burnout for mothers","Mitigation":"Provide access to childcare support and flexible work arrangements","Technologies":"Remote work software, telehealth services","People":"Mothers with small children","Owner":"Employers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Rise in the participation of migrant women in the labor market","Impact":"Potential increase in workplace interactions and exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote vaccination and enforce social distancing measures in workplaces","Technologies":"Access control systems, air quality monitoring devices","People":"Migrant women, co-workers","Owner":"Employers, public health authorities"}]}
